text: jinhe hum ne kitaab di hai wo to jo kuch aap par utara jata hai us se khush hote hai aur dosre firqe us ki baaz batho ke munkir hai, aap elaan kar dijiye ke mujhe to sirf yahi hukm diya gaya hai ke main Allah ki ibadath karo aur us ke saath shareek na karo, main osi ki taraf bula raha hoon aur osi ki jaanib mera lautna hai
